attributes.action: MP David Lammy should be asked to resign.
attributes.background: The people have spoken. We will leave the EU. Lammys comments on Twitter are undemocratic and he should have no place in Parliament - Wake up. We do not have to do this. We can stop this madness through a vote in Parliament. My statement below https://twitter.com/DavidLammy/status/746728892279431168

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
